overview.title: Overview
overview.content: JPG to PDF Converter is a free online tool that converts JPG images to PDF files while maintaining high quality. You can convert a single image or combine multiple images into one PDF document. It's perfect for creating image-based reports, submitting scanned documents, making portfolios, and many other uses for both business and personal needs. No software installation required - anyone can use it easily.

steps.title: Upload JPG Images
steps.description: Drag & drop, or click 'Select Files' to upload one or multiple JPG images.

steps.title: Adjust Order (if needed)
steps.description: Rearrange images by dragging to set the order you want them to appear in the PDF.

steps.title: Convert to PDF and Download
steps.description: Click the 'Convert' button and your PDF will be automatically generated and ready to download.

items.title: Combine Multiple Images into One PDF
items.description: Upload multiple JPGs and output them as a single PDF file in the exact order you want. Perfect for scanned documents, photo reports, or any content you want to manage and share as one file.

items.title: Flexible Layout and Image Order Adjustment
items.description: Change the order of images with simple drag operations before conversion, allowing you to freely arrange the structure of documents and reports. Simple operation with professional results.

items.title: Smooth Conversion while Maintaining Image Quality
items.description: Convert to PDF while preserving the clarity of JPG images at high resolution. High visibility as a document and fully suitable for printing purposes.

items.title: Completely Free, No Installation, Mobile-Friendly
items.description: No tedious registration or software downloads - use it right away from your browser. Works on smartphones and tablets too, so you can convert files on the go.

questions.question: Q1. Can I change the order of images?
questions.answer: Yes, you can rearrange images by drag & drop after uploading them.

questions.question: Q2. What happens to the size and ratio of photos in the PDF?
questions.answer: Images are automatically resized to fit optimally on PDF pages while maintaining image quality.

questions.question: Q3. Does it support other image formats (like PNG)?
questions.answer: The tool specializes in JPG format, but you can convert PNG to JPG first, then to PDF in a two-step process.

questions.question: Q4. Can I use it on a smartphone?
questions.answer: Yes, it's fully compatible with iPhones, Android devices, and tablets.

questions.question: Q5. Is it secure and private?
questions.answer: Uploaded files are automatically deleted after conversion within a set time period and are not stored on servers.
